extendedInfo.description: Whether you're looking for a new direction or just a few good laughs, the Video Game Name Generator has you covered.  Millions of ideas, from mundane to arcane, are now at your fingertip.  Yeah, it only takes one. â Share your creations straight from your device â Over 70 million combinations â 100% free - no upsells, no adsPermissions:* INTERNET - Required to download phrase listPowered by http://videogamena.me/.

reviews.title: Pure inspiration
reviews.comment: Fantastic. I\'ve actually started work on several of the names generated through this app/site (although they will probably never see completion.) This will be the resource I use to come up with ideas during the next Ludum Dare compo.  Please please add the ability to save names, even if just appending them to a text file.
reviews.author: Mike Howell

reviews.title: Nice port!
reviews.comment: A great android version of the original vgng. Always hilarious.
reviews.author: Matthew Belcher
